projects.title: Little Lemon Restaurant App
projects.description: A fully functional restaurant app developed as part of Meta's Android certification program. It features user authentication with Firebase, dynamic menu rendering via Firestore, and an admin panel for managing dishes and orders — all built with a polished Jetpack Compose UI.

projects.title: Wizardi – Multi-Utility Discord Bot
projects.description: A versatile and customizable Discord bot built with Python. Wizardi features modular command handling, rich embeds, moderation tools, and integrations for server utility and fun, all designed with scalability in mind.
